full_summary:
**Refrigeration Services for Kentville Research and Development Centre – Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006849
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 01B46-22-070
**Publication Date:** September 12, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 24, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
**Amendment Date:** October 11, 2022

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Scope of Work:** The work involves furnishing all labour, materials, equipment, tools, and supervision required to provide refrigeration services, including installation, removal, and repair of two multiplex refrigeration systems on an as-needed basis.

**Site Visit:** A site visit is highly recommended. The visit is scheduled for October 6, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. local time. Participants must sign an attendance form and arrive 10 minutes before the start time.

**Tender Requirements:** Tender submissions are to be sent via email to [Bidders who contact anyone other than the Contract Officer may be disqualified](mailto:Jacques.toussaint@canada.gc.ca). The AAFC Contract Officer reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part without prior negotiation.

**Contact Information:** Jacques Toussaint, Contract Officer, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, 2001 Robert-Bourassa, Room 671-TEN, Montréal, QC H3A 3N2, (514) 315-6124, jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca.
